trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> is a class that can be used to convert <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects from one data type to another.
Access this class through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can convert an instance of a specified type to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, using the specified context.
This method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is equal to a byte array.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that specifies the type you want to convert from.
This method returns `true` if this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can convert an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to an instance of a specified type, using the specified context.
This method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is equal to a byte array or string.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that specifies the type you want to convert to.
This method returns `true` if this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Converts a specified object to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that holds information about a specific culture.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be converted.
If this method succeeds, it returns the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that it created by converting the specified object.
Otherwise, it throws an exception.
The conversion cannot be completed.
Converts an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> (or an object that can be cast to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>) to the specified type.
The most common type conversion is to and from a string type.
The default implementation calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.
If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
A formatter context.
This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
This may be `null`, so you should always check.
Also, properties on the context object may also return `null`.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object that specifies formatting conventions used by a particular culture.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to.
This method returns the converted object.
The conversion cannot be completed.
Gets the set of properties for this type.
By default, a type does not return any properties.
An easy implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties%2A> method for the correct data type.
A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
The value of the object to get the properties for.
An array of <xref href="System.Attribute"></xref> objects that describe the properties.
The set of properties that should be exposed for this data type.
If no properties should be exposed, this can return `null`.
The default implementation always returns `null`.
Indicates whether this object supports properties.
By default, this is `false`.
A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
This method returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter.GetProperties*"></xref> method should be called to find the properties of this object.
